title: Cognitive Task Analysis-Based Instructional Method Application Program for English Reading Comprehension Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and understanding of fundamental mathematics terminology
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for working professionals in mathematics, operated in a limited technological environment (no PC, smartphone-based) with a blended approach centered on summative assessments

learning_goals: Learners must be able to extract key information from English mathematical texts with over 80% accuracy regarding mathematical concepts
Learners must be able to analyze complex English mathematical passages into a three-stage structure using cognitive task analysis strategies
Learners must achieve a 15% or higher score improvement in an official English reading test (TOEFL iBT Reading or equivalent) after a 4-week course

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
